mapper.select: select tc.cart_id, tc.product_id, tc.user_id, tc.quantity, tc.delete_status, tp.product_id, tp.product_name, tp.product_title, tp.description, tp.pic, tp.album_pics, tp.price, tp.promotion_price, tp.gift_point, tp.category_id, tp.delete_status from t_carts tc left join t_product tp on tc.product_id = tp.product_id where tc.delete_status = 0 and tc.user_id = #{userId}
mapper.insert: insert into t_carts(product_id, user_id, quantity) values (#{cart.productId}, #{cart.userId}, #{cart.quantity});
